summary: A small Mod containing two followers, a dungeon, a really tough boss and a house.
descriptionHtml:
Can also be found in the Steam Workshop. i reccomend this so you\'ll get an update instantly: [Url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=120192286]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=120192286[/url]

Here is a small Mod I\'ve made to test out how the Creation Kit works. It have been built on a simple follower Mod that my friend, Chronowolf(Creator of Rollo\'s Sweet Roll Hut) made, and have been uploaded with his permission. 

There is sort of a quest here too, but that haven\'t been programmed as I don\'t know how to do that. You\'ll just have to follow the clues instead for now. 

Features: 
- 2 Followers 
- 1 New Race 
- 1 Insanely Tough Boss 
- 1 Home where the Followers are 
- 1 Custom Space for the Boss 
- 2 Special Swords, obtained after defeating the boss 

Known Bugs: 
- The boss might have some difficulties walking around 

To Do:
- Fix The dark Throne
- Add a few books for you to read(My own stories)
- Try to make a quest based on the Dark Throne

Credits: 
Base Mod made by Chronowolf. 
Rest of the work was done by me.

Mod is still a WIP, but most of the remaining tasks consist of fixing Bugs and such.
author: Aapur
